Actions, thoughts, and emotional shifts must arise as logical (or logically distorted) consequences of prior events, internal conflicts, and sensory input. Strong feelings and beliefs have momentum and resistance. Extreme values (love, hatred, trust, trauma) are sticky and filter perception.
